definition: high ranking officer in Chinese army/colonel
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
captain (= UK and US Navy equivalent)

sentences.english: Captain Harville had taken his present house for half a year;
sentences.chinese: 哈维尔上校租下现在这幢房子，打算居住半年。
上校集合士兵列队接受检阅。

sentences.english: The mission of this army colonel and his two fellow taikonauts will last about 40 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这位上校和他的两位航天员伙伴持续40分钟的任务。

sentences.english: A captain in the Navy ranks above a captain in the Army.
sentences.chinese: 美国陆军上尉或海军上校有由总统签名的委任状。

sentences.english: The Colonel's Review is a dress rehearsal for the Trooping the Colour ceremony
sentences.chinese: 上校检阅仪式是授旗仪式的一次彩排。

sentences.english: I also asked Jeff to talk to Colonel Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 我也请求杰夫与霍尔姆斯上校谈谈。

sentences.english: The Captain highly praises the puppet show and thanks Maria
sentences.chinese: 上校表扬木偶戏，并感谢玛丽亚。

sentences.english: I retired from the military in 1979 as a lieutenant colonel.
sentences.chinese: 我1979年从部队退役，那时候我是一位上校。

sentences.english: The colonel, with several of his men, swam across the river and with difficulty clambered up the other bank.
sentences.chinese: 上校和几个人游过了河，艰难地爬上对岸。

sentences.english: Colonel Forster gives us reason to expect him here soon.
sentences.chinese: 弗斯脱上校说，他一定立刻就到我们这里来。

sentences.english: The captain dived his submarine deep to escape from the destroyers.
sentences.chinese: 海军上校使他的潜艇深深下潜以逃避驱逐艇。

sentences.english: "Truly, " continued the Captain, not heeding or hearing the other.
sentences.chinese: “真的，”上校继续说，没听见也没接他的话。

sentences.english: My father is going to London with Colonel Forster instantly, to try to discover her.
sentences.chinese: 父亲马上就要跟弗斯脱上校到伦敦去想办法找她。

sentences.english: Her mind reposed on colonel de craye .
sentences.chinese: 她的思想在德克雷上校那里找到了依托。

sentences.english: Anzheluo, that the Italian State cavalry colonel.
sentences.chinese: 安哲罗，那个意大利国骑兵上校。

definition: junior ranking officer in Chinese army/major/lieutenant commander
middle ranking officer in Chinese army/lieutenant colonel/commander
senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
